scripts.codegen:all: pnpm generate-manifests && for file in $(ls | grep 'subgraph\..*\.yaml'); do graph codegen $file --output-dir src/types/; done
scripts.codegen:goerli: pnpm generate-manifests && graph codegen subgraph.goerli.yaml --output-dir src/types/
scripts.codegen:matic: pnpm generate-manifests && graph codegen subgraph.matic.yaml --output-dir src/types/
scripts.deploy: for file in $(ls | grep 'subgraph\..*\.yaml'); do graph deploy --node https://api.studio.thegraph.com/deploy/ PoolMetadataRegistrySubgraph $file; done
